text: Saint Catherine's Monastery is a monastery in Sinai Peninsula, Egypt. It is part of a UNESCO World Heritage Site. == Other websites == * Official Website of the Holy Monastery of St. Catherine at Mount Sinai * Saint Catherine Area/ World Heritage Listing on UNESCO's Website * Saint Catherine Foundation Category:Archaeological sites in Egypt Category:World Heritage Sites in Egypt Category:Byzantine Empire Category:Monasteries Category:Eastern Orthodox Church Category:6th-century buildings and structures Category:South Sinai Governorate
title: Saint Catherine's Monastery
